original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭenti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyaḥ dve eka mañce tuvaṭṭenti

original: Manussā vihāracārikaṁ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: manussā vihāra cārikam āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭessanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ dve eka mañce tuvaṭṭessanti seyyathā api gihiniyaḥ kāmabhoginiyaḥ ti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ dve eka mañce tuvaṭṭessanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭentī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ dve eka mañce tuvaṭṭenti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭessanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ dve eka mañce tuvaṭṭessanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭeyyuṁ, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yāḥ pana bhikkhuniyaḥ dve eka mañce tuvaṭṭeyyu pācittiyanti

original: ekāya nipannāya aparā nipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ekāya nipannāya aparā nipajjati āpatti pācittiyassa
